SageTVPlugin.Name: Plucky's Menu Mod
SageTVPlugin.Description: Modified Horizontal Main menu for main menu screen with options. Allows menu to be placed at the top, bottom, or middle of the screen. As well as has a theme that modifies the backgrounds.There is also a matching theme in the themes section to get the backgrounds shown in screenshot.
